div.em: Current conditions as of 29 Apr 11:55 am CDT

div.div: Partly sunny, with a high near 63. Breezy, with a north northwest wind around 22 mph, with gusts as high as 33 mph.
Mostly clear, with a low around 37. North northwest wind 12 to 17 mph becoming light northwest after midnight. Winds could gust as high as 26 mph.
Sunny, with a high near 75. Calm wind becoming south 5 to 7 mph in the afternoon.
